name: School Fighters (Hisukurifu)
description:
Me and my classmates fight each other in this cringe fighting game.

CONTROLS

  • Player 1:
    • Move: A,D
    • Jump: W
    • Crouch: S
    • Punch: B
    • Ability: N
    • Secondary ability: S+N
    • Ultimate: M
  • Player 2:
    • Move: Left, Right Arrows
    • Jump: Up Arrow
    • Crouch: Down Arrow
    • Punch: 1 (Keypad)
    • Ability: 2 (Keypad)
    • Secondary ability: Down Arrow + 2 (Keypad)
    • Ultimate: 3 (Keypad)

The current version of the game is just a beta, please report any bug you find in the comments
